1: God speaks and calls the earth from sunrise to sunset.
2: Beauty radiates from within and inspires all around me.
3: Divine presence brings transformative change and powerful energy.
4: I uplift my voice to seek guidance and wisdom.
5: I unite with those who honor our promises through dedication.
6: The heavens reveal the beauty of justice and righteousness.
7: I listen and find guidance in my connection with the divine.
8: I appreciate your sacrifices and offerings consistently given.
9: I respect your property and take only what is mine.
10: All creatures in nature belong to me and thrive together.
11: I connect with all living creatures in nature.
12: I embrace abundance and share my blessings with others.
13: I seek inner nourishment and connection with the divine.
14: I give thanks and honor my commitments with joy.
15: I call in times of trouble and receive deliverance and joy.
16: I embrace and honor the guiding principles I cherish.
17: I embrace guidance and value important lessons.
18: I choose to stand with honesty and integrity in my actions.
19: I speak truth and uplift others with my words.
20: I uplift others and speak kindly to everyone.
21: I take action to help you see the truth clearly.
22: I focus on embracing positivity and kindness in my life.
23: I bring praise and right actions to divine salvation.
